title: ScaleSec's Specific Responsibilities

content.content: ScaleSec provides augmented support - assisting but never replacing ClearTriage's primary responsibilities.

items: **Incident Response**: Consultation and forensic assistance when Pete escalates (per RACI matrix: Consulted)
**Monthly POA&M**: Review findings, draft entries, track deadlines (Pete approves all entries)
**ConMon Deliverables**: Prepare monthly packages for FedRAMP PMO
**Annual Assessment**: Coordinate 3PAO engagement, act as liaison
**Documentation Reviews**: Quarterly SSP reviews, suggest updates (Shelly approves changes)

content.content: All ScaleSec requests go through Pete or Shelly. They advise - we decide.

keyTakeaways: ScaleSec assists with POA&M, ConMon, assessments, and documentation reviews
Pete retains all security decision authority
Shelly retains all documentation approval authority
ScaleSec is 'Consulted' in RACI matrix - never 'Responsible' or 'Accountable'
